name: Secret of the Magic Crystal

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Secret of the Magic Crystals/Secret of the Magic Crystals.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the BIAB archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Secret of the Magic Crystals/Secret of the Magic Crystals.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/Secret of the Magic Crystals.exe

    prefix: $GAMEDIR
